title: Hyperparameter - Data Science Training
content:
Do you want to be a data scientist? Are you a data scientist looking to gain some new skills?

I am very happy to announce the launch of Hyperparameter, my new company offering training for data scientists in London. Upcoming courses:

  • Introduction to Python for Data Scientists (20th November 2014)
  • Introduction to Machine Learning (21st November 2014)

We also offer bespoke training courses to meet your needs. Please get in touch if there is anything we can help you with - email daoud (dot) clarke (at) gmail (dot) com.
